caption.center: EUGENE JAMES HUTCH, Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant v. STATE OF HAWAI`I,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (S.P.P. NO. 99-0020)
opinion.attorneys: Eugene James Hutch, pro se, on the writ

opinion_text.italic: ORDER DENYING APPLICATION FOR WRIT OF CERTIORARI

opinion.opinion_byline:
RAMIL, J., for the court[fn1]
[fn1] Considered by: Moon, C.J., Levinson, Nakayama, Ramil, and Acoba, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: The Application for Writ of Certiorari filed on September 24, 2002 by Petitioner/Petitioner-Appellant Eugene J. Hutch is hereby denied.
